pullRequest.title: Introduce Audit credential
pullRequest.bodyText: See detailed description in the commit message.

afterCommit.message:
CB-7523 audit credential added

New field was intrudoced which is type on the credential domain this will clearly separate AUDIT and ENVIRONMENT credentials. New controller layer added as well just to clearly separate the two type of credential.

nodes.bodyText:
this should be authorized against the existing credential resource, not on account level
to do that:

add @CheckPermissionByResourceObject to the method
add @ResourceObject to the credentialrequest parameter (it is there as i see)
add @ResourceObjectField(action = AuthorizationResourceAction.EDIT_CREDENTIAL, variableType = AuthorizationVariableType.NAME) to the name field of the CredentialRequest class (I think this is done too since it is the same class as used in other crednetial controller)

so I think the method annotation should be changed only

afterCommit.message:
CB-7523 audit credential added

Audit credential was introduced. New Credential field on the domain which is type. It can be AUDIT or ENVIRONMENT and only account admin can create AUDIT credential and modify it. This credential only used for archive audit data into the customer account
